Event: Coalition Agreement Signed - Historic Arab Participation
Description: Yair Lapid and Mansour Abbas of United Arab List reached historic coalition agreement on June 2, 2021, just before midnight deadline. Included 8 parties: Yesh Atid, Blue and White, Yamina, Labor Party, Yisrael Beiteinu, New Hope, Meretz, and United Arab List. First time Arab party signed coalition agreement in Israeli history. Bennett and Lapid agreed to rotate PM role.

Event: Bennett Sworn In as PM - Netanyahu's 12-Year Rule Ends
Description: Naftali Bennett of Yamina sworn in as Israel's 13th prime minister, with Yair Lapid as alternate PM. Coalition government confirmed by vote of 60-59 in Knesset (with one UAL member abstaining). Marked the end of Benjamin Netanyahu's 12-year tenure as prime minister. Bennett to serve as PM until August 27, 2023, then Lapid takes over.
